channel.title: Error?
channel.description: heres the error: [code]client.java:178: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myPit location: class client if (myPit == 0) { ^ client.java:179: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myPit location: class client myPit = maxPits+1; ^ client.java:184: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myPit location: class client if (myPit != 0) { ^ client.java:186: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pitin location: class client pitin = myPit; ^ client.java:186: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myPit location: class client pitin = myPit; ^ client.java:188: cannot find symbol symbol : variable canAdd location: class NPCHandler server.npcHandler.canAdd = 1; ^ client.java:275: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myPit location: class client pitNPC(myPit, id, x, y, 1); ^ client.java:297: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Pit location: class NPC newNPC.Pit = pit; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 8 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

this is a new error i edited the post its an error for the jad mini game ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

client.java:178: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myPit location: class client if (myPit == 0) { ^ client.java:179: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myPit location: class client myPit = maxPits+1; ^ client.java:184: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myPit location: class client if (myPit != 0) { ^ client.java:186: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pitin location: class client pitin = myPit; ^ client.java:186: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myPit location: class client pitin = myPit; ^ client.java:188: cannot find symbol symbol : variable canAdd location: class NPCHandler server.npcHandler.canAdd = 1; ^ client.java:275: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myPit location: class client pitNPC(myPit, id, x, y, 1); ^ client.java:297: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Pit location: class NPC newNPC.Pit = pit; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 8 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @foz foz
item.description:
@foz wrote:

i had the same problem once, i trade them and they lagged me out, i fixed it and i can’t remember how…

If you have to many of a item in a shop i dont think the server likes, it, could you of maybe put a item id in accidently thats not in the cache you have ?

Read full topic

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @foz foz
item.description:
@foz wrote:

this should do the trick,

find this in your client.java

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

then add this under it…

} else if (NPCID == NPCIDHERE) { //SHOPNAME shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = SHOPID; //SHOPNAME Shop

This simple code just tells the server that the shop is linked with the Npc,

Do this for every shop you add.

I hope it helps…

~Foz

Read full topic

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

You put the WanneShop; thing also to client.java?

Read full topic
